content: this pattern is for a roomy fit bulky weight sock that works up quickly and is perfect for chilly days at home this sock is crocheted from the toe up and includes suggested adjustments for adult sizes 6 and up but can be easily be adjusted for a larger fit you can also go up a hook size for a roomier fit or down if you d like it a little snugger this pattern used loops and threads charisma yarn but any bulky weight should work just fine one skein of each color was good for crocheting a size 8 5 in women s but you may want to purchase an extra ball or two if you plan to go up sizes the pattern includes two eye options one in black as pictured and one in brown the eye embellishments are made with small amounts of yarn and uses some color changes two one inch brown buttons are also suggested but not necessary i hope you enjoy
